CONTRIBUTE_BODY.message: Pioneer is the sum of the many contributions from its players and developers. See anything you want to change, improve, or ideas for new content to add? (E.g. translations, coding, art, 2D & 3D assets, music, designing custom star systems, improve our documentation, wiki, etc.) Follow the links for details on how you can contribute!

DONATE_BODY.message: If you enjoy playing Pioneer and would like to support its continued development, please consider donating - no donation is too small.

DONATE_OPTIONS.message: For additional donation options, please see our

DONATE_OPTIONS_CONTINUED.description: hyperlink, ending part of sentence in 'DONATE_OPTIONS'

DONATE_THANKS.message: Thank you all for your continued support of Pioneer!

GAME_RELEASE.message: Stable versions are released annually on February 3, but development is continuous. Brave pilots are thus encouraged to play from the latest source and report bugs.

INFO_BLURB.message: Pioneer is a single player space adventure game set in the Milky Way galaxy at the turn of the 31st century.

INFO_BODY.message: The game is open-ended, and you are free to explore the millions of star systems in the game. You can land on planets, slingshot past gas giants, and burn yourself to a crisp flying between binary star systems. You can try your hand at piracy, make your fortune trading between systems, or do missions for the various factions fighting for power, freedom or self-determination.

SOFTWARE_BODY.message: Pioneer includes the following third-party software
